pages.text: Finally, there is sometimes the problem that a Crafter sends too much of one item into a machine, and that there is then no more room left for the other inputs. To remedy this, there is now a new option in the Crafters: max stack size.
This works the same way as it does in the Retriever and Requester: it limits the number of items it will send into the machine per item type. For the Basic and Hardened Crafters, this is set to 64.
